Posts.Content: Oh jjsailor Â I'm sorry to hear ur feeling so rubbish. I had fec-t back in September 2013. Take all the anti sickness they give u (i had domperidone )and try to eat something. I know it's hard. I used to suck polo mints or werthers to help with sickness that helped quite a bit. If ur suffering too much call the onc ward and get some advice. Take one day at a time, u will get thru this mate. U Tc xx .
Posts.Title: FEC in FEC
